SEARCH
Package pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.mapper

Class GSTaskMapper

java.lang.Object
pt.ipp.isep.dei.esoft.project.mapper.GSTaskMapper
public class GSTaskMapper extends Object
Mapper class for converting GSTask entities and DTOs. This class provides static methods to convert GSTask objects to GSTaskDTO objects and vice versa.

    • toModel

      public static GSTask toModel(GSTaskDTO taskDTO, GreenSpace selectedGreenSpace)
      Converts a GSTaskDTO to a GSTask entity.
      Parameters:
      taskDTO - The GSTaskDTO to convert.
      selectedGreenSpace - The GreenSpace associated with the task.
      Returns:
      The corresponding GSTask entity.

    • toDTOToDo

      public static List<GSTaskDTO> toDTOToDo(List<GSTask> associatedToDoEntriesList)
      Converts a list of GSTask entities to a list of GSTaskDTOs for To-Do list.
      Parameters:
      associatedToDoEntriesList - The list of GSTask entities to convert.
      Returns:
      A list of GSTaskDTO objects corresponding to the input list.
